channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Morgan Wallen Scores Third Album to Debut at Top of Albums Chart With ‘I’m the Problem’
item.description: 🎉 Morgan Wallen's 'I'm the Problem' takes the top spot on the charts for the third time! 🚀🎶 #CountryMusicKing

item.title: Billy Ray Cyrus & Elizabeth Hurley Make Red Carpet Debut as a Couple
item.description: 🎶 New power couple alert! Billy Ray Cyrus and Elizabeth Hurley dazzle on the red carpet together! 💑 #CoupleGoals #MusicNews

item.title: Neil Young Performs Eighties Deep Cut ‘My Boy’ for First Time in 42 Years
item.description: Neil Young bringing back the '80s vibes with 'My Boy' after 42 years! 🎸 Who's ready for this epic throwback moment? 🎶 #NeilYoung #MusicLegend

item.title: Sacha Jenkins, hip hop historian, filmmaker, musician & more, dies at 54
item.description: 🎶 Remembering and celebrating the incredible legacy of Sacha Jenkins 🙌🎤 #RIPSachaJenkins

item.title: Watch Drake Perform From The Balcony At Central Cee’s Toronto Show, Announce OVO Fest Is Returning
item.description: Drake surprises at Central Cee's show from the balcony and drops OVO Fest bombshell! 🙌 Who's ready for more Toronto vibes? 🎉 #OVOFest #Drake

item.title: Dave Matthews Band 2025 Summer Tour: How to Get Last-Minute Tickets
item.description: 🎸 Score a spot in the front row for Dave Matthews Band's 2025 Summer Tour! Snag those last-minute tickets before they're gone! 🎶 #DMB2025 🌟

item.title: Peter Buck & Barrett Martin Launch Another Supergroup Drink The Sea: Hear “Outside Again”
item.description: 🎶 Dive into the sounds of the new supergroup Drink The Sea with their fresh track "Outside Again"! 🌊 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Torche Announce Reunion Show Three Years After Breakup
item.description: Guess who's back, back again! 🎸 Torche reunites for a one-night-only show after 3 years apart. Let's rock! 🤘 #TorcheReunion

item.title: Neil Young Plays His “Favorite” Deep Cut For The First Time In 42 Years At Ontario School Benefit
item.description: Guess who's back with a blast from the past?! 🎸 Neil Young rocked out to a long-lost gem after 42 years! 🎶 #legendarymoment

item.title: D’Angelo Cancels Roots Picnic Performance Over Medical Issue
item.description: Sending healing vibes to D'Angelo 🌟 Wishing him a speedy recovery! 🎶 #GetWellSoonDangelo #MusicNews

item.title: Roger Nichols, Grammy-Nominated Co-Writer of ‘We’ve Only Just Begun,’ Dies at 84
item.description: 🎶 Remembering a legend 🌟 Roger Nichols, co-writer of 'We've Only Just Begun,' will forever live on through his music. 💫 #RIPRogerNichols

item.title: Alejandro Sanz Discusses How ‘Bésame’ With Shakira Came to Life | Billboard News
item.description: 🎶 Dive into the magic of music creation with @AlejandroSanz and @Shakira as they spill the beans on 'Bésame'! ✨ #MusicMagic #BehindTheScenes

item.title: Questlove Was ‘Shocked’ by Kendrick Lamar’s Homage to the Roots In ‘Squabble Up’ Video
item.description: 🎶 Questlove's reaction to Kendrick Lamar's homage in 'Squabble Up' is everything! Legends recognizing legends. 🙌 #musicnews #hiphopgems

item.title: Billie Eilish’s 2025 “Hit Me Hard and Soft Tour”: How To Get Tickets
item.description: 🎤 Ready to groove with Billie in 2025? Find out the ticket scoop now! 🔥 #BillieEilish #HitMeHardAndSoftTour

item.title: Bob Dylan Performed With Billy Strings, Probably Met Machine Gun Kelly
item.description: 🎸 Bob Dylan + Billy Strings + Machine Gun Kelly = Epic Jam Session Alert! 🎶 #MusicLegendsCollide #UnexpectedDuo

item.title: Love Remain – “U.K”
item.description: 🇬🇧 Feel the love for this UK-based band! 🎶✨#NewMusicAlert #LoveRemain

item.title: Billy Strings Joins Bob Dylan to Perform “All Along the Watchtower”: Watch
item.description: 🎸 Rock legends collide! @BillyStrings + @BobDylan team up for a killer rendition of "All Along the Watchtower" 🎶🔥 #MusicCollab

item.title: Blackpink’s Summer Stadium Tour Officially Has a Name: ‘Deadline’
item.description: Blackpink's summer stadium tour just got even hotter with the announcement of its epic name 🔥 Let the countdown to 'Deadline' begin! 🎶 #Blackpink #DeadlineTour

item.title: Bruiser Wolf Announces New Album Potluck, Shares New Single “Lock In”
item.description: 🔥 Let's feast on Bruiser Wolf's new album Potluck and groove to the tasty beats of "Lock In"! 🎶🍽 #NewMusicMonday

item.title: Avant Gardner Split With CEO After Botched Brooklyn Mirage Opening
item.description: 🎶 Drama in the music world! Avant Gardner says "buh-bye" to CEO post-Brooklyn Mirage mishap. 🎤 #MusicNews #StayTuned

item.title: Jane Remover Releases New Song “Supernova”: Listen
item.description: 🚀 Blast off with @JaneRemover's stellar new track "Supernova"! 🎶💫 Press play now and let the music take you to another galaxy! #NewMusicAlert 🌌

item.title: Forth Wanderers Announce First Album Since 2018, Share New Video: Watch
item.description: 🎉 Ready to dance? Forth Wanderers are back with new music! 💃🎵 Check out their latest video now! #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Bill Fox Gives Rare Interview After Release Of First Album In 13 Years
item.description: 🌟 Bill Fox breaks his silence! 🎶 Dive into his comeback journey with an exclusive interview. 🎤 #MusicNews #BillFoxInterview

item.description: 🌟 Tune in as Metric brings the 'Fantasies' magic straight to your screen! 🎶✨ #livemusic #metric #virtualconcert

item.description: 🌟 Richard Ashcroft is back! 🎶 Listen to his new track "Lover" now and get ready for those nostalgic vibes! #NewMusicAlert 🎸
